Hello,

you reached my motion graphics overview. As I mentioned before, already as a child I loved cartoons and animations. Around 2008 I started working with forseesense on several projects. While working on these projects I always came across problems that had to be solved by scripting. Most of the time these scripts are tiny helper tools that don't make sense to others but some of them are more. They turned into my open source scripts provided on aescripts.com. For these scripts I created demos that you can consider advertising for what people can do with them. Besides these videos I created several characters and infographic animations for exhibitions/science centers. See my favorite moving pictures below.

Script Demos

These videos are the demos I created for my scripting projects. The aim was to show what you can do with my tools. With some eyecandy but not to much so the recipient does not get distracted. Some kind of "bare bones" animation.

Locations.jsx 4 AE

Geo referenced animations. Just watch the video or read more over here.

AEMap.jsx 4 AE

Real map data. Just watch the video or read more over here.

Monoline Text.jsx 4 AE

Single stroke text. Just watch the video or read more over here.

swissd.jsx 4 AE

Fixed width text layouts. Just watch the video or read more over here.

Character Animations

These three following animations are part of the work I did with forseesense for customer like Petri & Tiemann GmbH, wortreich in Bad Hersfeld gGmbH, m.o.l.i.t.o.r. GmbH, the Klimahaus® "Bremerhaven 8° Ost" Betriebsgesellschaft mbH, OÖ Science-Center Wels Errichtungs-GmbH, the experimenta - Science Center der Region Heilbronn-Franken gGmbH and others. I did the animation parts using most of the time the ingenious Duik Tools by DuDuF.

Animated using a custom character rig I developed. This was before I knew duik tools existed.

mis·cel·la·ne·ous

/ˌmisəˈlānēəs/ Adjective
1. (of items or people gathered or considered together) Of various types or from different sources.
2. (of a collection or group) Composed of members or elements of different kinds: "a miscellaneous collection".

Wow. You are still here. This chapter will lead you to various projects on this site and around the web. Feel free to contact me about anything.

Kandinsky auf Schwarz

for the mattrunks contest n°8 over here

E3D & Newton

This is faked 3D physics in After Effects using Newtons 2D engine and combining it with Element 3D.

Mellow Mark ist tot

A music video for Mellow Mark

FHP Colloquium

A quick and a bit dirty stop-motion animation made with Dragonframe and After Effects that summons up my colloquium presentation at the FHP. It was used as icebreaker before the presentation.

The Geo Beast

A experimental script for After Effects. I tried to build one tool that could read all type of geojson data. It works but is to complex. I decided to split out different functions to make smaller tools like Locations.jsx. You can still download the script and read the documentation over here

Klimahaus Bremerhaven

A 2×HDV projection in the Klimahaus Bremerhaven 8° Ost. I did lots of rotoscoping and painting on really bad footage from the bear and the seal.
